item.description:
Hottest Party South of the North Pole! 2 for $20 tickets until this Friday! Promo code "crawl" We'll be meeting up for brunch prior to the start of the event at Anthem Kitchen Bar, then walk over together to the Bell In Hand to start the event. Meet there if you'd like, but I recommend getting there about 1230 to beat the crowds... http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/crawling_with_mrs_claus.htm Sexy Santa Bar Crawl & Boston Most Eligible Grand Opening & Mixer   You work hard during the week, slaving away like a little elf in Santa’s workshop. Once the weekend rolls around, it’s time to party hard like the bossman – in this case, the Sexy Santa Pub Crawl! Gather up the red-nosed reindeer (or your friends, whichever is easier) and join the fun at Boston's Sexy Santa Pub Crawl on Saturday December 8th.   You’ll ho-ho-ho your way through popular bars in the Faneuil Hall area, stopping for specialty drinks at the cash bar, light refreshments and tons of holiday fun at each stop. Dress in your best Sexy Santa outfit, ugly sweater or Christmas speedo and get ready for a good time!   Join us at the Hottest Party South of the North Pole! Sexy Santa Xmas Pub Crawl Saturday, December 8th Madness from 2pm - 8pm Faneuil Hall Area. Starts at Paddy O's!   Featuring specialty drinks (cash bar), food at most stops,  and looking for "Sexy Santa or most outrageous holiday outfit" ie: ugly sweater, Santa Hat, Christmas Speedo or Bikini....   Registration is from 12:30pm - 2:00pm  (Starting location is Paddy O's) All guests receive one FREE T Shirt*, wrist bands for free cover charge, drink specials at each venue ranging from $1.75 - $3.00, food at select stops, and so much more!    * Arrive before 2pm to guarantee admission and closer to 12:30 to avoid any lines.

Stay tuned for more information...
item.name: Sexy Santa Bar Crawl & Boston Most Eligible Group Grand Opening Mixer
